languages.text: "Не знаю. Это одна из тех паршивых ситуаций, когда только время покажет, насколько верно ты поступил".
"I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."
languages.original_text: "Не знаю. Это одна из тех паршивых ситуаций, когда только время покажет, насколько верно ты поступил".

traits.locale_text: "I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."
"I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."
"I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."
"I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."
"I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."
"I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."

languages.text: 「分かりません。時が経ってみなければ、自分の対処が正しかったかどうか分からない類の、難しい状況でした」
languages.original_text: "I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."

traits.locale_text: 「分かりません。時が経ってみなければ、自分の対処が正しかったかどうか分からない類の、難しい状況でした」

languages.text: "Ich weiß es nicht. Es war eine dieser unangenehmen Situationen, bei denen erst die Zeit zeigt, wie gut man sie gemeistert hat."
languages.original_text: "I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß es nicht. Es war eine dieser unangenehmen Situationen, bei denen erst die Zeit zeigt, wie gut man sie gemeistert hat."

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas. Je pense qu'il s'agit de l'une de ces situations où seul l'avenir nous dira si vous l'avez abordée de manière adéquate. »
languages.original_text: "I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas. Je pense qu'il s'agit de l'une de ces situations où seul l'avenir nous dira si vous l'avez abordée de manière adéquate. »

languages.text: «Lo ignoro. Fue una de esas situaciones difíciles en las que solo el tiempo dirá si se manejó bien o no».
languages.original_text: "I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."

traits.locale_text: «Lo ignoro. Fue una de esas situaciones difíciles en las que solo el tiempo dirá si se manejó bien o no».

languages.text: “我也不清楚。塔瑟拉的局面非常复杂，恐怕只有时间能证明你的决定是否合适。”
languages.original_text: "I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."

traits.locale_text: “我也不清楚。塔瑟拉的局面非常复杂，恐怕只有时间能证明你的决定是否合适。”

languages.text: "Bilmiyorum. Bu denli zor bir durumun iyi idare edilip edilmediğini yalnızca zaman gösterebilir."
languages.original_text: "I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."

traits.locale_text: "Bilmiyorum. Bu denli zor bir durumun iyi idare edilip edilmediğini yalnızca zaman gösterebilir."

languages.original_text: "I do not know. It was one of those tough situations where only time will tell how well you handled them."
